Card_AccessibleLabel_Desc_Key: Provides an accessible label for screen readers.
Card_Alignment_Desc_Key: Specifies the alignment of the card content (Vertical, Horizontal).
Card_Appearance_Desc_Key: Defines the visual style of the card (e.g., Filled, Outline).
Card_AutoHeight_Desc_Key: Automatically adjusts the height based on content.
Card_Description_Key: Provides a customizable card view for various purposes.
Card_ImagePlacement_Desc_Key: Specifies where the preview will be shown (Header or Body).
Card_Size_Desc_Key: Specifies the size of the card (Small, Medium, Large).
Card_Toolbar_Items_Desc_Key: Specifies the items in the toolbar and their configuration.
